availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Gilpin Barret (Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and banker)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and banker. Greensburg, Kentucky, native. Married to Ann E. Rodes Barret. Father of Amanda Barret, Rhodes Barret, and Henrie W. Barret. Graduated from law school at the University of Louisville in Louisville, Kentucky. Cashier of the Louisville Branch of the Southern Bank of Kentucky from 1861 to 1865. Partner in the law firm of Pope & Barret in partnership with Hamilton Pope in Louisville in 1861.
